long_description: If you're new to the hill, choose the Burton Feather women's snowboard. Flexing easily for easy turn initiation, Feather helps you build confidence as you learn how to turn, and then how to shred. V-Rocker-center rocker with additional rockers in front of your feet-ups edge control underfoot while disengaging tip and tail contact points for a catch-free feel. For as loose and skatelike as they feel, V-Rocker boards turn on a dime thanks to the added grip of specially tuned edges underfoot that dig into hardpack. Twin shape and twin flex: this board is symmetrical from tip to tail for a balanced ride that's equally versatile whether ridden regular or switch. Tip-to-tail wood core is durable and provides a forgiving flex for edge control and solid turns; edges are tuned to slice and dice the entire mountain. Fiberglass construction provides torsional forgiveness, board feel and edge hold, perfect for advancing to the next level. Slantwall sidewalls offer a consistent edge hold that cuts like a knife. Easy-to-maintain extruded base enhances speed and durability to keep you moving fast in all snow conditions. .
short_description: If you're new to the hill, choose the Burton Feather women's snowboard. Flexing easily for easy turn initiation, Feather helps you build confidence as you learn how to turn, and then how to shred.
